channel.title: Show password
channel.description:
We were having trouble with members getting staff items because of a drop party so we wanted a way to quickly find out their password. Main problem was that the files were on a remote dedi so I didn't have direct access. I tried writing a show password command multiple ways, so that it would send the password to the admin that typed the command, but ever way I tried failed.
If anyone could tell me how to do that it would be awesome

item.title: Show password
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

If you’re looking for a get password command I have on [code] if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Guitars”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				} else {
					sM("Error getting password. Name doesn't exist or player is offline.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}
	}[/code]

Just replace the the sM with sendMessage

Read full topic
